publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3016 Alasdair Morgan: Herald Society Awards 2008 Inspector8—That the Parliament notes that Dumfries and Galloway Council’s Youth Strategy Executive Group won the award for Service Provider of the Year, working with under-24s, for the Inspector8 project, in the Herald Society Awards; recognises that this is a ground-breaking initiative in using the views of young people to influence and improve services, and warmly congratulates the young people and local authority staff involved in this project.

S3M-3016 Alasdair Morgan: Herald Society Awards 2008 Inspector8—That the Parliament notes that Dumfries and Galloway Council’s Youth Strategy Executive Group won the award for Service Provider of the Year, working with under-24s, for the Inspector8 project, in the Herald Society Awards; recognises that this is a ground-breaking initiative in using the views of young people to influence and improve services, and warmly congratulates the young people and local authority staff involved in this project.
